house_listing.house_description: *Magnolia iii model. Optional 5th bedrm (f.R.O.G.). New custom community of only 28 homesites. All brick exterior std, luxury master bath, high ceiling & columns, custom cabinets, very open & spacious floor plan. Caruana homes newest & most sucessful floor plan! *3000 sqft w/frog.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Contemporary Style, Foyer, Ranch Style, Utility Room,Walk-In Closet(s)
